name: Ninja Pinguin
description:
Ninja Pinguin is crazy One Button Game in which you are Azmo, a pinguin willing for vengeance !

Run, slide, dash, grab and wallrun in 3 uniques levels and maybe try the Pingutsu mode, if you feel brave enought ! 

PS : If you downloaded on PC, you can use the space bar or the left mouse button  to play.
